message:
How come it is gore ??? XD
well weird , she is playing that in a hospital , well it really is a comedy thru n thru.

ain't it bit too dramatic ? But I liked n cringed on those parts . kinda reminds me of over dramatic films that are infused with melodrama plus how old animes used to work and the diff nowadays. The drama is still there but it is changed in some other ways .
It really shows that this really is an anime that was made some 15 or more years back.
